thread.title: Ground News - Irving High School Senior Wins Essay Competition Honoring Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.
thread.title_full: Ground News - Irving High School Senior Wins Essay Competition Honoring Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Irving High School Senior Wins Essay Competition Honoring Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.
text:
Summary by Ground News Melissa Asigbe, a senior at Irving High School, recently secured first place in the city's essay competition commemorating the legacy of Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. The competition, held by the City of Irving, invited students from grades 9 through 12 to reflect on Dr. King's impact and share their perspectives.
